page.title: 14STAFFORD NEWSLETTER JUNE 21
page.content:
{S.P.A.C.E. 1985} On Wednesday the S.P.A.C.E. scheme was launched.This is Staffordshire Police Activity and Community Enterprise. Activities are provided for thousands of children during August.The Chief Constable said that Staffordshire's scheme was becoming known all over the world.In Stafford there will be parties etc. and special activities such as horse-riding,swimming,shooting,walking and canoeing.
{SCOUTS GET IN FUN MOOD} Scouts from Stafford, Penkridge,Great Haywood,Weston and Gnosall gathered at Kibblestone Camp Site near Stone for a day of Â£medieval madness'.There was jousting and feasting and a chance to throw sponges at Akela in the stocks.
